no clarification here soooo, this isn't JUST in Spanish is it?  It's a slow torrent for me so I decided to ask before waiting another 10 hours =/  Please tell me it's in English

confirmed, in English, game works perfectly.  Just use 7zip or winrar to un-rar the torrent, then use daemon tools (or similar) to mount the image to install.  After installation copy the crack to to the program files>capcom>re5 and there ya go :)

Hard Drive: 8 GB Free
Video : DirectX 9.0c/Shader3.0 or higher compatible, NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or higher, ATI HD 2400 Pro or higher, VRAM 256MB or higher
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
DirectX: 9.0c
